name: __EUserInterfaceActionType
doc: Types of user interfaces that can be associated with a user interface action

None: An action which should not be associated with a user interface action
Button: Momentary buttons or menu items.  These support enable state, and execute a delegate when clicked.
ToggleButton: Toggleable buttons or menu items that store on/off state.  These support enable state, and execute a delegate when toggled.
RadioButton: Radio buttons are similar to toggle buttons in that they are for menu items that store on/off state.  However they should be used to indicate that menu items in a group can only be in one state
Check: Similar to Button but will display a readonly checkbox next to the item.
CollapsedButton: Similar to Button but has the checkbox area collapsed
